title: Product Engineer
fit reason: Strong ML/DS and product interest but lacks required React/TypeScript/Node full‑stack experience and prefers business/GTM roles rather than intensive in‑person engineering.
role description: Letta is hiring a Product Engineer for its Agent Development Environment to build developer-facing tools and interfaces for self-improving AI agents. The role focuses on designing and implementing a visual agent authoring environment (web and desktop), SDKs for building agent apps, and cloud deployment/monitoring tooling, working closely with designers, researchers, founders, customers, and the open-source community. This is an in-person role in downtown San Francisco.
role responsibilities: ['Design and build the Agent Development Environment (visual interface) for web and desktop (macOS, Windows)', 'Develop and maintain application SDKs that enable full-stack agent apps', 'Implement cloud platform features for deploying, monitoring, and testing agents in production', 'Collaborate closely with designers, researchers, founders, customers, and the open-source community to define UX and product functionality', 'Create visualizations and tooling for agent features (multi-agent collaboration, memory, voice, cross-agent communication)', 'Render and expose low-level LLM interactions (e.g., input/output tokens, context) to improve transparency and control']
role reqs: ['Strong frontend development skills (React)', 'Full-stack experience including API design and working with databases (Postgres, Redis)', 'Backend proficiency (Next.js, Node, TypeScript); Python is a plus', 'Excellent communication skills for interfacing with designers and customers', 'Passion for developer experience and understanding of LLMs/agent internals', 'Able to work in-person 5 days/week in downtown San Francisco']
